description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员，第十三届全国人民代表大会河南省代表。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, a member of the Communist Party of China, and a deputy from Henan Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 河南省洛阳市下辖区，宁建华的家乡。
description.en: A district under the jurisdiction of Luoyang City, Henan Province, hometown of Ning Jianhua.
The dominant ethnic group in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通称中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会代表

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会代表
en: Deputy to the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的组成人员，是中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关的成员。
description.en: A member of the National People's Congress, which is the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本信息，宁建华是河南孟津人。
description.en: According to the text, Ning Jianhua is from Mengjin, Henan.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本信息，宁建华是汉族。
description.en: According to the text, Ning Jianhua is of Han ethnicity.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本信息，宁建华是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the text, Ning Jianhua is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本信息，宁建华是中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: According to the text, Ning Jianhua is a political figure of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，宁建华被选为河南省出席第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: In 2018, Ning Jianhua was elected as a deputy from Henan Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会代表

position.en: Deputy to the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 宁建华的职务为全国人大代表。
description.en: Ning Jianhua's title is Deputy to the National People's Congress.
